languages.text: "Подтверждаю. Согласно архивной записи №1Е-99237 Магос Эксплоратор Тарзус Ханейманн //нес службу//обслуживал// корабль — идентификатор засекречен — в функции блюстителя реликвария. В результате //серии кощунственных нарушений ритуала эксплуатации//покушения// он получил тяжелые повреждения органической и священной частей своего тела".

"Confirmed. According to the archive entry 1E-99237, Magos Explorator Tarzus Haneumann //served on//maintained// the ship — identifier classified — in the capacity of a reliquary caretaker. He sustained extensive damage to both the organic and the sacred part of his body in //a series of sacrilegious breaches of the Rite of Operation//an assassination attempt//."
languages.original_text: "Подтверждаю. Согласно архивной записи №1Е-99237 Магос Эксплоратор Тарзус Ханейманн //нес службу//обслуживал// корабль — идентификатор засекречен — в функции блюстителя реликвария. В результате //серии кощунственных нарушений ритуала эксплуатации//покушения// он получил тяжелые повреждения органической и священной частей своего тела".

languages.text: 「確認。アーカイブ1E-99237によると、マゴス探検家のターザス・ヘニュマンは聖骨箱の管理人という立場で、識別子極秘の船の//修理//維持//を行った。彼は//一連の任務の儀礼に対する冒涜的な違反//暗殺企図//により、身体の有機および神聖なる部位のいずれにも甚大なるダメージを受けた」
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. According to the archive entry 1E-99237, Magos Explorator Tarzus Haneumann //served on//maintained// the ship — identifier classified — in the capacity of a reliquary caretaker. He sustained extensive damage to both the organic and the sacred part of his body in //a series of sacrilegious breaches of the Rite of Operation//an assassination attempt//."

traits.locale_text: 「確認。アーカイブ1E-99237によると、マゴス探検家のターザス・ヘニュマンは聖骨箱の管理人という立場で、識別子極秘の船の//修理//維持//を行った。彼は//一連の任務の儀礼に対する冒涜的な違反//暗殺企図//により、身体の有機および神聖なる部位のいずれにも甚大なるダメージを受けた」
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: “已确认。编号1E-99237档案显示，塔祖斯·哈努曼贤者——身份识别代码保密，以圣物管理员的身份在船上//服役//执行维护工作//。他身体的有机部分与神圣部分都受到了严重伤害，源于//一系列对行动仪式的亵渎行为//一次暗杀企图//。”
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. According to the archive entry 1E-99237, Magos Explorator Tarzus Haneumann //served on//maintained// the ship — identifier classified — in the capacity of a reliquary caretaker. He sustained extensive damage to both the organic and the sacred part of his body in //a series of sacrilegious breaches of the Rite of Operation//an assassination attempt//."

traits.locale_text: “已确认。编号1E-99237档案显示，塔祖斯·哈努曼贤者——身份识别代码保密，以圣物管理员的身份在船上//服役//执行维护工作//。他身体的有机部分与神圣部分都受到了严重伤害，源于//一系列对行动仪式的亵渎行为//一次暗杀企图//。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Bestätigt. Laut Archiveintrag 1E-99237 war Magos-Explorator Tarzus Haneumann auf dem Schiff – Identifikator geheim – als Reliquiar-Hausmeister //tätig//beschäftigt//. Er erlitt erhebliche Schäden am organischen wie am heiligen Teil seines Körpers bei //einer Reihe von gotteslästerlichen Verstößen gegen das Betriebsritual//einem Mordanschlag//."
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. According to the archive entry 1E-99237, Magos Explorator Tarzus Haneumann //served on//maintained// the ship — identifier classified — in the capacity of a reliquary caretaker. He sustained extensive damage to both the organic and the sacred part of his body in //a series of sacrilegious breaches of the Rite of Operation//an assassination attempt//."

traits.locale_text: "Bestätigt. Laut Archiveintrag #1E-99237 war Magos-Explorator Tarzus Haneumann auf dem Schiff – Identifikator geheim – als Reliquiar-Hausmeister //tätig//beschäftigt//. Er erlitt erhebliche Schäden am organischen wie am heiligen Teil seines Körpers bei //einer Reihe von gotteslästerlichen Verstößen gegen das Betriebsritual//einem Mordanschlag//."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: « Affirmatif. D'après l'extrait d'archives 1E-99237, le magos explorator Tarzus Haneumann a //servi sur//entretenu// le vaisseau, matricule classé confidentiel, en qualité de gardien de reliquaire. Les parties biogéniques et sacrées de son organisme ont subi des dégâts considérables lors d'une //série d'infractions sacrilèges au Rite d'Opération//tentative d'assassinat//. »
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. According to the archive entry 1E-99237, Magos Explorator Tarzus Haneumann //served on//maintained// the ship — identifier classified — in the capacity of a reliquary caretaker. He sustained extensive damage to both the organic and the sacred part of his body in //a series of sacrilegious breaches of the Rite of Operation//an assassination attempt//."

traits.locale_text: « Affirmatif. D'après l'extrait d'archives 1E-99237, le magos explorator Tarzus Haneumann a //servi sur//entretenu// le vaisseau, matricule classé confidentiel, en qualité de gardien de reliquaire. Les parties biogéniques et sacrées de son organisme ont subi des dégâts considérables lors d'une //série d'infractions sacrilèges au Rite d'Opération//tentative d'assassinat//. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: «Confirmado. Según la entrada de archivo 1E-99237, el Magos explorador Tarzus Haneumann //sirvió en//se encargaba del mantenimiento de// la nave — identificación clasificada — en calidad de cuidador del relicario. Sufrió daños considerables tanto en la parte orgánica de su cuerpo como en la sagrada en //una serie de infracciones sacrílegas del Rito de Operación//un intento de asesinato//».
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. According to the archive entry 1E-99237, Magos Explorator Tarzus Haneumann //served on//maintained// the ship — identifier classified — in the capacity of a reliquary caretaker. He sustained extensive damage to both the organic and the sacred part of his body in //a series of sacrilegious breaches of the Rite of Operation//an assassination attempt//."

traits.locale_text: «Confirmado. Según la entrada de archivo #1E-99237, el magos explorador Tarzus Haneumann //sirvió en//se encargaba del mantenimiento de// la nave — identificación clasificada — en calidad de cuidador del relicario. Sufrió daños considerables tanto en la parte orgánica de su cuerpo como en la sagrada en //una serie de infracciones sacrílegas del Rito de Operación//un intento de asesinato//».
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Onaylandı. 1E-99237 sayılı arşiv girdisine göre Magos Keşiftör Tarzus Haneumann, kutsal emanet odasının muhafızlığı vazifesinde — kimlik bilgileri gizlidir — //gemisinde hizmet etmiş//gemisinin bakımı yapmıştır//. //Faaliyet Ayini'ni aşmaya çalışan bir dizi hürmetsizlik eylemi//Bir suikast girişimi// sonucunda bedeninin hem organik hem de kutsal kısımları ağır hasar almıştır."
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. According to the archive entry 1E-99237, Magos Explorator Tarzus Haneumann //served on//maintained// the ship — identifier classified — in the capacity of a reliquary caretaker. He sustained extensive damage to both the organic and the sacred part of his body in //a series of sacrilegious breaches of the Rite of Operation//an assassination attempt//."

traits.locale_text: "Onaylandı. 1E-99237 numaralı arşiv girdisine göre Magos Keşiftör Tarzus Haneumann, kutsal emanet odasının muhafızlığı vazifesinde — kimlik bilgileri gizlidir — //gemisinde hizmet etmiş//gemisinin bakımı yapmıştır//. //Faaliyet Ayini'ni aşmaya çalışan bir dizi din dışı eylem//Bir suikast girişimi// nedeniyle bedeninin hem organik hem de kutsal kısımları ağır hasar almıştır."
traits.speaker: Opticon22
